00015 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC( CStopNewDlg, CDialog )
00016 
00017 BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP( CStopNewDlg, CDialog )
00018     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDOK, OnBnClickedOk )
00019     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_LAT, OnFormChanged )
00020     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_LON, OnFormChanged )
00021     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_NAME, OnFormChanged )
00022     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_STOPNEW_RDO_LEGACY, OnFormChanged )

00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 void CStopNewDlg::DoDataExchange
00062     (
00063     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00064     )
00065 {
00066     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00067 
00068     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_LAT, mLatitudeStr );
00069     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_LON, mLongitudeStr );
00070     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_NAME, mMessageStr );
00071     DDX_Radio( aDataExchange, IDC_STOPNEW_RDO_A603, mStopProtocol );
00072 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00073     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_STOPID, mStopId );
00074 #endif
00075 }

00077 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 BOOL CStopNewDlg::OnInitDialog()
00085 {
00086     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00087     UpdateData( TRUE );
00088 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00089     mStopProtocol = STOP_PROTOCOL_A603;
00090 #elif( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00091     mStopProtocol = STOP_PROTOCOL_A602;
00092 #else
00093     mStopProtocol = STOP_PROTOCOL_LEGACY;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00097     mStopId.Format( _T("%u"), mCom.getNextStopId() );
00098 #endif
00099 #if( !FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00100     CButton * rdo603 = (CButton *)GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_RDO_A603 );
00101     rdo603->SetCheck( BST_UNCHECKED );
00102     rdo603->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00103     GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_STOPID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00104 #endif
00105 #if( !FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00106     CButton * rdo602 = (CButton *)GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_RDO_A602 );
00107     rdo602->SetCheck( BST_UNCHECKED );
00108     rdo602->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00109 #endif
00110 #if( !FMI_SUPPORT_LEGACY )
00111     CButton * rdoLegacy = (CButton *)GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_RDO_LEGACY );
00112     rdoLegacy->SetCheck( BST_UNCHECKED );
00113     rdoLegacy->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00114 #endif
00115     UpdateData( FALSE );
00116     return TRUE;
00117 }   /* OnInitDialog() */

00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 void CStopNewDlg::OnFormChanged()
00126 {
00127     bool formIsValid = true;
00128 
00129 #if !SKIP_VALIDATION
00130     char stopIdString[11];
00131     memset( stopIdString, 0, sizeof( stopIdString ) );
00132 
00133     UpdateData( TRUE );
00134     if( mLatitudeStr == "" || _tstof( mLatitudeStr ) < -90 || _tstof( mLatitudeStr ) >= 90 )
00135         formIsValid = false;
00136     if( mLongitudeStr == "" || _tstof( mLongitudeStr ) < -180 || _tstof( mLongitudeStr ) >= 180 )
00137         formIsValid = false;
00138     if( mMessageStr.GetLength() == 0 )
00139         formIsValid = false;
00140     if( mStopProtocol == STOP_PROTOCOL_A602 && mMessageStr.GetLength() >= 51 )
00141         formIsValid = false;
00142     if( mMessageStr.GetLength() >= 200 )
00143         formIsValid = false;
00144 
00145     #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00146     if( mStopProtocol == STOP_PROTOCOL_A603 )
00147     {
00148         GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_STOPID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00149         GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_LBL_STOPID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00150     }
00151     else
00152     {
00153         GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_EDIT_STOPID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00154         GetDlgItem( IDC_STOPNEW_LBL_STOPID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00155     }
00156     if( 0 != WideCharToMultiByte( CP_ACP, 0, mStopId.GetBuffer(), mStopId.GetLength(), stopIdString, sizeof( stopIdString ), NULL, NULL ) )
00157     {
00158         if( UTIL_data_is_uint32( stopIdString ) )
00159         {
00160             uint32 stopId = _tstoi( mStopId.GetBuffer() );
00161             if( mCom.mA603Stops.contains( stopId ) )
00162                 formIsValid = false;
00163         }
00164         else
00165         {
00166             formIsValid = false;
00167         }
00168 
00169     }
00170     else
00171     {
00172         formIsValid = false;
00173     }
00174     #endif
00175 #endif
00176 
00177     if( formIsValid )
00178     {
00179         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00180     }
00181     else
00182     {
00183         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00184     }
00185 
00186 }   /* OnFormChanged */
00187 
00188 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 void CStopNewDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00194 {
00195     double lat;
00196     double lon;
00197     char message[200];
00198 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00199     uint32 stopId;
00200 #endif
00201 
00202     UpdateData( TRUE );
00203     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mMessageStr.GetBuffer(), -1, message, 200, NULL, NULL );
00204     message[199] = '\0';
00205     lat = _tstof( mLatitudeStr.GetBuffer() );
00206     lon = _tstof( mLongitudeStr.GetBuffer() );
00207     switch( mStopProtocol )
00208         {
00209 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00210         case STOP_PROTOCOL_A603: // A603
00211             if( mStopId == "" )
00212                 stopId = mCom.getNextStopId();
00213             else
00214                 stopId = _tstoi( mStopId.GetBuffer() );
00215             mCom.sendA603Stop( lat, lon, message, stopId );
00216             break;
00217 #endif
00218 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00219         case STOP_PROTOCOL_A602: // A602
00220             mCom.sendA602Stop( lat, lon, message );
00221             break;
00222 #endif
00223 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_LEGACY )
00224         case STOP_PROTOCOL_LEGACY: // Legacy
00225             mCom.sendLegacyStop( lat, lon, message );
00226             break;
00227 #endif
00228         default:
00229             break;
00230         }
00231 
00232     OnOK();
00233 }   /* OnBnClickedOk() */
